name: Juan VILLANUEVA, Petitioner v. Judge Bruce F. BRATTON and Stephen E. Farina, Prothonotary, Respondents

parties: Juan VILLANUEVA, Petitioner v. Judge Bruce F. BRATTON and Stephen E. Farina, Prothonotary, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonota-ry is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
128 A.3d 1199
Juan VILLANUEVA, Petitioner v. Judge Bruce F. BRATTON and Stephen E. Farina, Prothonotary, Respondents.
No. 170 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2015.
